targets.rawSql: SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ec2_instances_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_lambda_functions_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_s3_buckets_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ebs_volumes_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_vpc_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_security_groups_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_iam_users_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_iam_roles_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_dynamodb_tables_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_sqs_queues_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_sns_topics_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT sum(value) FROM (SELECT argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_acm_certificates_total' AND TimeUnix >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote}) GROUP BY Attributes)

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ec2_instances_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['instance_type'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ec2_instances_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_lambda_functions_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['runtime'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_lambda_functions_total' AND length(Attributes['runtime']) > 0 AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_s3_buckets_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['volume_type'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ebs_volumes_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_dynamodb_tables_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_vpc_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_subnet_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_security_groups_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_internet_gateways_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_nat_gateways_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, 'IAM Users' as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_iam_users_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, 'IAM Roles' as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_iam_roles_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['status'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_acm_certificates_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_sqs_queues_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_sns_topics_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, 'Route53 Zones' as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_route53_hosted_zones_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, replaceRegexpOne(MetricName, 'aws_(.*)_total', '\1') as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName LIKE 'aws_%_total' AND MetricName NOT LIKE '%radar%' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) AND (length(Attributes['region']) = 0 OR Attributes['region'] IN (${region:singlequote})) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_rds_instances_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['status'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_rds_instances_total' AND length(Attributes['status']) > 0 AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, region, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['region'] as region, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_eks_clusters_total' AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, region, attrs) GROUP BY time, region ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['status'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_eks_clusters_total' AND length(Attributes['status']) > 0 AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

SELECT time, metric, sum(value) as value FROM (SELECT toStartOfMinute(TimeUnix) as time, Attributes['state'] as metric, argMax(Value, TimeUnix) as value, Attributes as attrs FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName = 'aws_ec2_instances_total' AND length(Attributes['state']) > 0 AND $__timeFilter(TimeUnix) GROUP BY time, metric, attrs) GROUP BY time, metric ORDER BY time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['region'] as region FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName LIKE 'aws_%_total' AND length(Attributes['region']) > 0 ORDER BY region
list.label: Region
list.name: region
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['region'] as region FROM aws_radar.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE MetricName LIKE 'aws_%_total' AND length(Attributes['region']) > 0 ORDER BY region
